Title: Nightmares
Plot: When strange things begin happening to the students at Sunnydale High, it seems that everyone is living their worst nightmares. Buffy and the gang must hold together to stop the phenomena before reality and the nightmare world become one.
GuestStars: Sean Moran, Dom Magwili, Patty Ross, Johnny Green, Brian Pietro, Scott Harlan, Terry Urdang, Justin Urich, Jeremy Foley, Dean Butler, J. Robin Miller, Andrew J. Ferchland, Marc Metcalf, Kristine Sutherland
